p: High wettability and uniform spreading ability of the edible coating on the targeted food product are desired characteristics of edible coatings while designing the formulations [ 84, 85, 86]. Therefore, the effects of the components on the surface tension of the coating solutions are an important factor. Yet, glycerol and sorbitol do not have a significant effect on the surface tension of the solutions due to not being tensio-active substances [ 87, 88].
